summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6188 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 10, Halls Addition, and in Block 4, Jansen's Addition, being the alley between 20th Avenue North and 21st Avenue North, from East Denny Way to Jansen Court; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87329, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
